# Join our LinkedIn group
This is your gateway to connect with a vibrant community of HEOR professionals, including both esteemed alumni and our current student body. 

📝 Please note that all join requests will be carefully reviewed by our admin team to ensure a meaningful and secure networking environment. 

As a member of our LinkedIn group, here's what you can look forward to:  
💡 **Networking Events & Job Posting:** Connect with fellow students, faculty, and professionals in the field of HEOR.  
💡 **Educational Workshops:** Enhance your knowledge and skills through workshops led by experts.  
💡 **Research Opportunities:** Collaborate on projects that contribute to the advancement of healthcare policies and practices.  
💡 **Community Service:** Give back to the community by participating in health-related volunteer activities.  

We encourage you to get involved, share your ideas, and contribute to our community. Whether you're here to learn, network, or contribute to research, there's a place for you in our chapter.

<a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/14360028/"><button class="button">Join Now</button></a>
